title: Aatrox R healing.. a bit too much now?
body:
Don't eat me all at once now...
But i've played in recent games alongside several aatroxes and boy... 
that thing doesn't die.

I was legit shocked.
He hits R and goes 1v5 healing 1/3 of his health every Q he hits.

I was convinced he would die that i fled the fight when we got caught 2v5..
Looked back and saw him just healing up back to full health every Q he hits.

He wasn't even fed. He was 2-2 and he was 1v5ing.

I really think his healing is WAY too much..

replies.body: to be fair, he is a juggernaut, their entire job is to be able to 1v5, it was really the intent when the class was added in the first place, but I personally haven't seen enough Aatroxes lately to give my two cents, so I may be wrong

Dude, i was shocked...
Absolutely amazed by what this aatrox pulled off
Not really, the moment you buy grievous wounds items, that healing doesn't matter. Thats why toplaners vs him run ignite, to cuck him of any healing.

Lol, of course it matters..
Sure grievous wounds is strong but he still gets 60% of his healing, which is still alot.

Dunno ....what i've seen was aatrox healing himself unreasonably fast in a fight even when the enemy team had grievous wounds.. 

That's just the experience i've had with him...
Then the enemy must have been dumb enough to get hit by every edge Q.

Wait until you see a Mundo Ult with {{item:3065}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3022}},: recently had a first time Mundo get a pentakill in normals after  our top ran it down until 0 - 16 and Mundo was unkillable

> He hits R and goes 1v5 healing 1/3 of his health every Q he hits.

Weird, lately im spamming aatrox and i have still to 1v5. Or remain alive for that matter (provided im not stupidly ahead). 

>  Looked back and saw him just healing up back to full health every Q he hits.

Not true unless he is stupidly ahead.

I can attach a replay... show you what i mean. He wasn't stupidly ahead. He wasn't even fed.

Not now anyway.. going to sleep
